Author: sadgorlthrowwaway
Text: I’m so sorry for your mom :(  I completely understand what you mean because it is damaging to my relationships as well when people try to stop me from my disordered behaviors. I would never want her to feel attacked or anything like that. I hope we can all start to feel better soon.

Author: grumpygrumbles
Text: It’s really hard territory. My mom has an ED too and only just opened up to me about it in March before returning to denial/extreme dieting land. Honestly, I think it’s best to just have some self preservation and recognize that she’s an adult who makes her own decisions regarding her body. It’s so hard. You could try talking to her, but if she doesn’t take it seriously the first time you bring it up, it’s unlikely she ever will.
